alert.note: Alert for Allen; De Kalb (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 4:53PM EDT until July 20 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Allen County in northeastern Indiana... Southern De Kalb County in northeastern Indiana... Central Defiance County in northwestern Ohio... Paulding County in west central Ohio... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 453 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Huntertown, or near Garrett, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Fort Wayne, Defiance, Auburn, Garrett, Hicksville, Huntertown, Paulding, Antwerp, Woodburn, Payne, Grabill, St. Joe, Leo-cedarville, Concord, Newville, Grover Hill, Scott, Melrose, Haviland, and Altona. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
